resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text:
June 24th 1846 Dear Friend,

I cannot tell exactly when I began to write this little book – but it must have been I think in 1835-6. My twins lived and died in February 1834: I was so weak for half a year after that time that I could scarcely sit up on my couch to take my meals. As soon as I began to rise up a little from this dire frustration, which commenced above a year before, I tried to employ myself in teaching Herbert, and one of my methods of teaching appears in the Pretty Lessons, which was only a handful out of a heap of lessons – poems of my writing.

When these were printed I began to think of writing a little fantastic story for Herbet’s amusement – without any thought of its being published. The commencement was admired by older hands, and I was induced to carry it on as far as Fancy led.Shut out as I was from the
resource.chars:
June 24th 1846 Dear Friend,

I cannot tell exactly when I began to write this little book – but it must have been I think in 1835-6. My twins lived and died in February 1834: I was so weak for half a year after that time that I could scarcely sit up on my couch to take my meals. As soon as I began to rise up a little from this dire frustration, which commenced above a year before, I tried to employ myself in teaching Herbert, and one of my methods of teaching appears in the Pretty Lessons, which was only a handful out of a heap of lessons – poems of my writing.

When these were printed I began to think of writing a little fantastic story for Herbet’s amusement – without any thought of its being published. The commencement was admired by older hands, and I was induced to carry it on as far as Fancy led.
